title: Erudite Order
text: The Erudite Order is a small [[wizard's circle|arcane order]] in modern-day [[Valenar]], formerly eastern [[Cyre]], having branched off from the [[Arcane Order of Aureon]] several hundred years ago. The order incorporates cultural viewpoints from the [[Khunan]] community there (see the "Eastern Cyre" section under [[Cyre]]).
